ygData.subject: RE: Blue Plate Mail
ygData.msgSnippet: You don t have to worry about getting stuck in dungeons either.  Barbarians do.  You can enter every building in Norrath.  Barbarians can not enter ANY of the
ygData.messageBody:
You don't have to worry about getting stuck in dungeons either. Barbarians
do. You can enter every building in Norrath. Barbarians can not enter ANY
of the buildings in Kelethin that have a single door - we are too wide.
Hmmm...the game has been out 4 months and we are just finding out about the
centaur armor. Could it be possible someone else makes armor for the little
people and big people? Nah, Verant would never do that! Lets just whine
about not getting the blue plate armor - we are doomed to where bronze or
steel plate the rest of our lives when the bigger people gets the cool blue
stuff. Sorry for the sarcasm - its early Monday and I have to work all
week :) It DOES make sense that it is only for medium races, however. I
doubt if any of the centaurs are the size of a dwarf or gnome or halfling.
I think trolls and ogres would have a better argument. Have you seen the
centaur that creates the armor?? Huge. But then again they are evil, so
they gives a good reason why its not available to them.

Angarth Bladedancer, Warrior of the 21st Tier (Still)
"Periissem ni periisem"


> ----------
> From: J Eric Rowland[SMTP:gemini68@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Saturday, July 24, 1999 7:44 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Blue Plate Mail
>
> From: J Eric Rowland <gemini68@...>
>
> Yeah, Once again us dwarven warriors get to bend over and take it. We
> don't get
> slam, and now we don't get this new armor either. But, hey, we do have a
> really
> cool jump animation! We do that awesome tuck-and-roll when we jump! WOW!
> That's
> worth something isn't it? Isn't it? *Laughs bitterly*
>
>
